It's a cute shirt with a flattering fit but there's no way this is 95% cotton. I have similar shirts that are 100% rayon that feel exactly like this. Trying to buy less synthetic clothing, so I don't like that this is a non-breathable synthetic.

I can’t take credit for this one. My daughter (14 yr old) picked this top out and had to have it. I was skeptical being that it looks like it is a crop top, and my daughter is not allowed to wear tops like that to school. I’m more of the practical parent, if you can’t wear it to school (where you spend most of your time) then you don’t need it. But I got it anyway. It’s actually not a crop top on my daughter, if fits a little longer than the picture shows. So she is able to wear it to school. In fact she’s been wearing it a lot! The quality is pretty good in the sense I wash my daughter’s clothes and it has not shrunk in the wash nor fallen apart. It still feels soft like it did when I bought it.
Love how well this top fits! So comfortable, has a nice stretch and so easy to style!

When I first opened it, I was so scared because it looked too small to fit me and then I tried it on and it turns out that it was super stretchy so it looks great on me. I’m in love with the design too!!!
